name: ROS 2 Jazzy
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'source /opt/ros/jazzy/setup.bash && apt update && apt install -y python3-colcon-common-extensions git vim && echo "export RMW_IMPLEMENTATION=rmw_cyclonedds_cpp" >> /root/.bashrc && echo "export CYCLONEDDS_URI=file:///root/.cyclonedds.xml" >> /root/.bashrc && echo "export ROS_DOMAIN_ID=0" >> /root/.bashrc'
